document.full_text: american repertory theater in cambridge, mass., stages a new version of aeschylus' 'prometheus bound,' by a creator of 'spring awakening' and the lead singer of system of a down.
document.title: he may be bound, but this prometheus still manages to rock
lines_and_colors: american repertory theater in cambridge, mass., stages a new version of aeschylus' 'prometheus bound,' by a creator of 'spring awakening' and the lead singer of system of a down.
